channel.title: Project Sk8ScApE500 Development Team - Starting! **SCREENS ARE UP**
channel.description:
Ok first before we start anything we need:
• Coders Of Source ( FULL ) • Client Coders. ( Recruiting ) • Testers. ( FULL) • Designers. ( Recruiting ) • Site moderators ( Recruiting ) • And a Hoster. (GOTTA BE LOYAL!) ( STILL NEED ONE )
REWARDS!
If you are loyal to the owner help out and do what your supposed to be doing etc. coding? Then you can become mod/admin, maybe even on the forums.
HOW CAN YOU JOIN?
Well, if you want to join first you will have to make a topic with the subject of what job/role you want to do. In the topic you will have to say: Job, Age, Experience, Proof and How we can contact you. For Example : [code]Job: Age Experience Proof Email [/code]
SERVER FEATURES!
100% ancients working. Max lvl 126; 99 stats. Help book in quest page Spawn place is Varrok. Very good training ground 100% clanhandler, lots of shops, DEFENDERS, working specs, working range. Healing spell
Link To Our Site Is [url=http://Www.Z7.Invisionfree.Com/Sk8ScApE]Www.Z7.Invisionfree.Com/Sk8ScApE[/url]
NOTE THE SERVER WILL ONLY BE OPENED AFTER ITS 100% ! THO IT WILL BE ABLE TO TRY OUT! :) - #A-M!
Ham Network : Sk8Scape500
Ham Pass : 123
Ip Look For Mikkel :P
SCREENSHOTS!!
[URL=http://www.mypicshare.com/iubxcqcbpic.html][IMG]http://www.mypicshare.com/thumbs/20070708/iubxcqcb.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://www.mypicshare.com/a9ok4ji7pic.html][IMG]http://www.mypicshare.com/thumbs/20070708/a9ok4ji7.jpg[/img][/URL]
I Count Add More Cause Of Internet Screwed Up :'(
